articles.author: Chloe Taylor, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Europe stocks rise as investors look ahead to U.S.-China trade talks in Switzerland - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks opened higher on Friday as investors look forward to the U.S.-China trade talks set to begin this weekend in Switzerland.
articles.content:
In a note to clients on Friday morning, Russ Mould, investment director at AJ Bell, said European investors were "belatedly celebrating" the trade deal between the U.K. and the U.S.
